resources.string: If the app is force stopped, it will be disabled by the system.\n\nTo re-enable, open the app manually (once).
On some phones, background autostart needs to be enabled in System Settings. Applicable on, for ex., Xiaomi MIUI (tested)
Can interfere with getting a GPS fix and running app in background.\nDisable in App Settings under Battery or BatterySaver
App is configured to use system default SIM for calls but no default is selected in system settings\n\nSelect which SIM to use, or setup default SIM in System Settings.
Default option uses System default SIM for voice calls. If default SIM is not selected in system settings, SMS sending will not work.
App needs access to GPS location (FINE_LOCATION) all the time (BACKGROUND_LOCATION) so it can respond to incoming location requests.
App needs RECEIVE_SMS permission to detect location requests and SEND_SMS permission for responding to and sending requests.
App needs READ_PHONE_STATE permission to automatically resend response when network is available.
